fields.label: Property Description
fields.summary: Write a brief one-line description of the unit/space (e.g., Office unit, Retail shop, Warehouse bay).

fields.label: Location
fields.summary: Write full address: Unit/Floor/Building, Street/Barangay, City/Municipality, Province/State, Country, ZIP.

fields.label: Floor Area / Lot Area (Square Meter (sqm))
fields.summary: Write the size in sqm (numbers only, e.g., 85.50).

fields.label: Company Name
fields.summary: Write the SEC-registered legal name.

fields.label: Trade Name (If Any)
fields.summary: Write business name used publicly, if different; otherwise write N/A.

fields.label: Nature of Business
fields.summary: State the main line of business (e.g., Retail – Electronics, Food Service).

fields.label: Domicile
fields.summary: Tick one: • Domestic • Foreign. If Foreign, write country of domicile.

fields.label: Form of Organization
fields.summary: Tick one: • Sole Proprietor • Partnership • Corporation.

fields.label: Office Address
fields.summary: Fill all lines: Unit/No./Bldg/Street; Subdivision/Village/Barangay; City/Municipality; Province/State; Country; ZIP.

fields.label: Telephone Number
fields.summary: Write landline with area code (e.g., 02-XXXX-XXXX) or N/A.

fields.label: Facsimile
fields.summary: Write fax number or N/A.

fields.label: Website
fields.summary: Write company website URL or N/A.

fields.label: Full Name
fields.summary: Write First, Middle, Last Name, Suffix (match valid ID).

fields.label: Date of Birth
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Citizenship / Nationality
fields.summary: Tick Filipino or write Other nationality.

fields.label: Domicile
fields.summary: Tick Domestic or Foreign. If Foreign, write country of permanent residence.

fields.label: Gender
fields.summary: Tick Male or Female.

fields.label: Civil Status
fields.summary: Tick Single • Married • Separated • Widowed • Others (specify).

fields.label: Present Address
fields.summary: Write full current address with ZIP.

fields.label: SSS / GSIS No.
fields.summary: Write SSS or GSIS number (if available).

fields.label: TIN
fields.summary: Write 9–12 digit TIN (if available).

fields.label: ACR / I-Card No. (if Foreign)
fields.summary: Write ACR/I-Card number and validity (if applicable).

fields.label: Occupation / Position
fields.summary: Write job title or business role.

fields.label: Employer / Business Name
fields.summary: Write company/business name if employed/self-employed.

fields.label: Years in Employment / Business
fields.summary: Write whole years (e.g., 3).

fields.label: Contact Details
fields.summary: Write mobile number and email address.

fields.label: Existing Banking Relationship(s)
fields.summary: For each bank: write Bank Name/Branch; select Account Type (Deposit • Credit Card • Other); write Account Number.

fields.label: How did you find the property?
fields.summary: Select one: • BDO Website • Online Classifieds • Newsprint/Poster • Social Media • Referred by Agent • BDO Employee • Branch.

fields.label: Purpose / Use of Leased Unit
fields.summary: Write intended use (e.g., Office, Retail, Warehouse).

fields.label: Relationship to BDO / Lessor / Affiliates
fields.summary: Tick if related. If YES, write Relationship, Name of Company, and Relative’s Full Name.

fields.label: AMLC Registration (DNFBP)
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If YES, indicate category and provide PCOR/COR. If NO, state if in process or not required (attach basis).

fields.label: MTPP / AML Manual
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. Confirm coverage: KYC • Monitoring • Reporting • Sanctions Screening • Training • Records • Independent Testing.

fields.label: Adverse Information / Compliance Issues
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If YES, write brief details.

fields.label: Declarations
fields.summary: Confirm information is true/correct; authorize verification; acknowledge that non-disclosure or false info may lead to disapproval/legal action.

fields.label: Consent to Process Personal Data
fields.summary: Consent to collection/processing/sharing within BDO Group & third parties for legitimate purposes; retention up to 10 years from last transaction or as required by law; to withdraw/limit marketing or access/update data, contact BDO DPO.

fields.label: Valid ID Details
fields.summary: Select ID type (Driver’s License • Passport • SSS • UMID • PhilID • TIN • Others) and write ID number.

fields.label: Signature over Printed Name
fields.summary: Lessee/Authorized Signatory signs; write Designation (if company) and Date (MM/DD/YYYY).

fields.label: For Office Use
fields.summary: Leave these fields blank (completed by BDO/Lessor personnel).
